body:
You will pay for content you have no control over and it forms part of a service you have to provide. There are no alternatives and you are hosting the information on your website. Because you have to do this, there are no alternatives, and you have not had bespoke development done, this is not your responsibility and could be considered disproportionate burden to try and change. Some inaccessible content is often better than no content. You should look at what reasonable adjustments you could make, but also look into a disproportionate burden assessment.

## Example
